10 from threading import Thread

12 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.BlocklyManager import BlocklyManager
13 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.PythonManager import PythonFileManager
14 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.programs_manager_enums import LanguageEnum
15 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.ProgramsFileManager import FileAlreadyExistException, FileDoesNotExistException

17 # Command Status
18 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
19 
20 # Messages
21 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.msg import ProgramList
22 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.msg import ProgramLanguage, ProgramLanguageList
23 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.msg import ProgramIsRunning

26 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger

28 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.srv import ExecuteProgram
29 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.srv import GetProgram, GetProgramResponse
30 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.srv import GetProgramAutorunInfos, GetProgramAutorunInfosResponse
31 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.srv import GetProgramList
32 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.srv import ManageProgram
33 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.srv import SetProgramAutorun, SetProgramAutorunRequest

35 
36 class ProgramManagerNode:
37 
38  def __init__(self):
39  rospy.logdebug("Programs Manager - Entering in Init")
40 
41  self.__programs_base_dir = os.path.expanduser(rospy.get_param("~programs_dir"))
42  if not os.path.isdir(self.__programs_base_dir):
43  os.makedirs(self.__programs_base_dir)
44 
45  self.__python3_manager = PythonFileManager(self.__programs_base_dir, LanguageEnum.PYTHON3)
46  self.__blockly_manager = BlocklyManager(self.__programs_base_dir)
47 
48  rospy.logdebug("Programs Manager - Managers created !")
49 
50  self.__standalone = rospy.get_param("~standalone")
51 
52  self.__autorun_file_path = os.path.join(self.__programs_base_dir, rospy.get_param("~autorun_file_name"))
53 
54  self._manager_map = {
55  # This is a temporary fix in order to keep a semi compatibility with python2
56  ProgramLanguage.PYTHON2: self.__python3_manager,
57  ProgramLanguage.PYTHON3: self.__python3_manager,
58  ProgramLanguage.BLOCKLY: self.__blockly_manager,
59  }
60 
61  self.__str_to_program_language_map = {
62  "NONE": ProgramLanguage.NONE,
63  "PYTHON2": ProgramLanguage.PYTHON2,
64  "PYTHON3": ProgramLanguage.PYTHON3,
65  "BLOCKLY": ProgramLanguage.BLOCKLY,
66  }
67  self.__program_language_to_str_map = {
68  index: string
69  for string, index in self.__str_to_program_language_map.items()
70  }
71  self.__autorun_mode_to_str = {
72  SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE: "DISABLE",
73  SetProgramAutorunRequest.ONE_SHOT: "ONE_SHOT",
74  SetProgramAutorunRequest.LOOP: "LOOP",
75  }
76  self._str_to_autorun_mode = {index: string for string, index in self.__autorun_mode_to_str.items()}
77 
78  # Services
79  rospy.Service('~manage_program', ManageProgram, self.__callback_manage_program)
80  rospy.Service('~get_program_list', GetProgramList, self.__callback_get_program_list)
81  rospy.Service('~get_program', GetProgram, self.__callback_get_program)
82 
83  rospy.Service('~execute_program', ExecuteProgram, self.__callback_execute_program)
84  self.__execute_from_string_program_name = rospy.get_param("~execute_from_string_program_name")
85 
86  rospy.Service('~stop_program', Trigger, self.__callback_stop_program)
87  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.NONE, "")
88 
89  # Publisher
90  self.__program_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~program_list', ProgramList, latch=True, queue_size=1)
91  self.__publish_program_list()
92 
93  self.__program_is_running_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~program_is_running',
94  ProgramIsRunning,
95  latch=True,
96  queue_size=1)
97  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
98 
99  # - Autorun
100  rospy.Service('~set_program_autorun', SetProgramAutorun, self.__callback_set_program_autorun)
101  rospy.Service('~get_program_autorun_infos', GetProgramAutorunInfos, self.__callback_get_program_autorun_infos)
102  rospy.Service('~execute_program_autorun', Trigger, self.__callback_execute_program_autorun)
103 
104  self.__loop_autorun = False
105 
106  self.__execution_thread = None
107  self.__execution_stopped = False
108 
109  rospy.on_shutdown(self.stop_program)
110 
111  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
112  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
113 
114  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Started")
115 
116  # -- ROS CALLBACKS
117  # Program
118  def __callback_manage_program(self, req):
119  language_used = req.language.used
120  if language_used not in self._manager_map:
121  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_UNKNOWN_LANGUAGE, "Unknown Language"
122  manager = self._manager_map[language_used]
123  try:
124  if req.cmd == req.SAVE:
125  manager.create(req.name, req.code, req.description, req.allow_overwrite)
126  self.__publish_program_list()
127 
128  message = "Created program '{}'".format(req.name)
129  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - {}".format(message))
130 
131  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message
132  elif req.cmd == req.DELETE:
133  manager.remove(req.name)
134  self.__publish_program_list()
135 
136  message = "Removed program '{}'".format(req.name)
137  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - {}".format(message))
138 
139  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message
140  else:
141  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "Programs Manager - Command '{}' not found.".format(req.cmd)
142  except FileAlreadyExistException as e:
143  rospy.logerr("Programs Manager - File already exists !")
144  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
145  except Exception as e:
146  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_WRITING_FAILURE, str(e)
147 
148  def __callback_get_program_list(self, req):
149  language_msg = req.language
150  return self.___get_program_list(language_msg)
151 
152  def __callback_get_program(self, req):
153  resp = GetProgramResponse()
154  language_used = req.language.used
155  if language_used not in self._manager_map:
156  resp.status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_UNKNOWN_LANGUAGE
157  resp.message = "Unknown Language"
158  return resp
159  manager = self._manager_map[language_used]
160  try:
161  code, description = manager.read(req.name)
162  saved_at = manager.get_saved_at(req.name)
163  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", code, description, saved_at
164  except Exception as e:
165  resp.status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_READ_FAILURE
166  resp.message = str(e)
167  return resp
168 
169  def __callback_execute_program(self, req):
170  if self.__program_is_running.program_is_running:
171  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED, "Program is already running", ""
172  language = req.language.used
173  if req.execute_from_string:
174  name = None
175  code_string = req.code_string
176  else:
177  name = req.name
178  code_string = None
179  return self.__execute_program(language, name=name, code_string=code_string)
180 
181  def __callback_stop_program(self, _req):
182  return self.stop_program()
183 
184  # Autorun
185  def __callback_set_program_autorun(self, req):
186  mode = req.mode
187 
188  if mode == SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE:
189  return self.__disable_autorun()
190 
191  language_used = req.language.used
192  if language_used not in self._manager_map:
193  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_UNKNOWN_LANGUAGE, "Unknown Language"
194 
195  manager = self._manager_map[language_used]
196  if not manager.runnable:
197  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_NOT_RUNNABLE_LANGUAGE, "Not Runnable Language"
198 
199  name = req.name
200 
201  if not manager.exists(name):
202  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST, "File Doesn't Exist"
203 
204  return self.__save_autorun_infos(language_used, name, mode)
205 
206  def __callback_get_program_autorun_infos(self, _req):
207  language, name, mode = self.__get_autorun_infos()
208 
209  if language is None:
210  resp = GetProgramAutorunInfosResponse()
211  resp.status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_AUTORUN_FAILURE
212  resp.message = "Failed to get autorun infos"
213  return resp
214 
215  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "OK", language, name, mode
216 
217  def __callback_execute_program_autorun(self, _req):
218  if self.__program_is_running.program_is_running:
219  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED, "Program is already running"
220 
221  language_obj, name, mode = self.__get_autorun_infos()
222 
223  if language_obj is None or language_obj == ProgramLanguage.NONE:
224  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Autorun file is not set")
225  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_AUTORUN_FAILURE, "Autorun file is not set"
226 
227  if mode == self._str_to_autorun_mode["ONE_SHOT"]:
228  self.__loop_autorun = False
229  elif mode == self._str_to_autorun_mode["DISABLE"]:
230  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Autorun disable")
231  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_AUTORUN_FAILURE, "Autorun disable"
232  else:
233  self.__loop_autorun = True
234 
235  self.__program_is_running.program_is_running = True
236  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
237 
238  self.__execution_thread = Thread(target=self.__execute_program,
239  name="execution_thread_programs_manager",
240  args=[language_obj.used, name, None])
241  self.__execution_thread.setDaemon(True)
242  self.__execution_thread.start()
243 
244  message = "Executing autorun program ..."
245  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - {}".format(message))
246  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message
247 
248  # - Functions
249  def __publish_program_list(self):
250  programs_list = self.___get_program_list(ProgramLanguage(ProgramLanguage.ALL))
251  self.__program_list_publisher.publish(*programs_list)
252 
253  def __execute_program(self, language_used, name=None, code_string=None):
254  if language_used not in self._manager_map:
255  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_UNKNOWN_LANGUAGE, "Unknown Language", ""
256  manager = self._manager_map[language_used]
257  if not manager.runnable:
258  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_NOT_RUNNABLE_LANGUAGE, "Not Runnable Language", ""
259 
260  if code_string:
261  prog_name = self.__execute_from_string_program_name
262  manager.create(prog_name, code_string, description="", allow_overwrite=True)
263  else:
264  prog_name = name
265 
266  self.__execution_stopped = False
267 
268  try:
269  if not self.__program_is_running.program_is_running:
270  self.__program_is_running.program_is_running = True
271  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
272 
273  ret, message, output = manager.execute(prog_name)
274  while self.__loop_autorun and ret:
275  ret, message, output = manager.execute(prog_name)
276 
277  if not isinstance(message, str):
278  message = message.decode()
279  if not isinstance(output, str):
280  output = output.decode()
281 
282  except FileDoesNotExistException:
283  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.FILE_ERROR, "File Doesn't Exist")
284  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
285  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST, "File Doesn't Exist", ""
286  except Exception as e:
287  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.EXECUTION_ERROR, str(e))
288  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
289  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED, str(e), ""
290 
291  if ret:
292  message = "Program execution success"
293  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - {}".format(message))
294  status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
295  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.SUCCESS, message)
296  elif self.__execution_stopped:
297  status, message = CommandStatus.PREEMPTED, "Program successfully stopped"
298  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.PREEMPTED, message)
299  else:
300  status, message = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED, message
301  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.EXECUTION_ERROR, message)
302 
303  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
304  return status, message, output
305 
306  def __get_autorun_infos(self):
307  if not os.path.isfile(self.__autorun_file_path):
308  return None, None, None
309  with open(self.__autorun_file_path, "r") as input_file:
310  yaml_file = yaml.safe_load(input_file)
311 
312  mode = self._str_to_autorun_mode[yaml_file["mode"]]
313 
314  language = ProgramLanguage(self.__str_to_program_language_map[yaml_file["language"]])
315 
316  return language, yaml_file["name"], mode
317 
318  def __disable_autorun(self):
319  self.__save_autorun_infos(ProgramLanguage.NONE, "", SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE)
320  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Programs Manager - Disable Autorun Program"
321 
322  def __save_autorun_infos(self, language, name, mode):
323  language_str = self.__program_language_to_str_map[language]
324  mode_str = self.__autorun_mode_to_str[mode]
325 
326  json_dict = {"language": language_str, "name": str(name), "mode": mode_str}
327  with open(self.__autorun_file_path, "w") as output_file:
328  yaml.dump(json_dict, output_file, default_flow_style=False)
329 
330  message = "Programs Manager - Change autorun " \
331  "setting to file {} in {} mode".format(name,
332  mode_str.replace("_", " ").title())
333  rospy.loginfo(message)
334 
335  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message
336 
337  def ___get_program_list(self, language_msg):
338  language_used = language_msg.used
339  if language_used != language_msg.ALL:
340  # If language_used is unknown
341  if language_used not in self._manager_map:
342  return [], [], []
343  else:
344  manager = self._manager_map[language_used]
345  prog_list, description_list = manager.get_all_names_with_description()
346 
347  programs_names = prog_list
348  list_of_language_list = [ProgramLanguageList([language_msg])]
349  programs_description = description_list
350  else:
351  prog_dict = {}
352  for language, manager in self._manager_map.items():
353  # Get all names from a manager
354  all_names = manager.get_all_names()
355  # Adding them to dictionary
356  for name in all_names:
357  if name[0] == ".":
358  # Secret file
359  continue
360  elif name not in prog_dict:
361  prog_dict[name] = [language]
362  else:
363  prog_dict[name].append(language)
364 
365  languages_list_list = []
366  for lang_list in prog_dict.values():
367  ros_lang_list = ProgramLanguageList([ProgramLanguage(lang) for lang in lang_list])
368  languages_list_list.append(ros_lang_list)
369 
370  description_list = []
371  for name, languages in prog_dict.items():
372  if ProgramLanguage.PYTHON2 not in languages:
373  description_list.append("")
374  else:
375  description = self.__python3_manager.read_description(name)
376  description_list.append(description)
377 
378  programs_names = prog_dict.keys()
379  list_of_language_list = languages_list_list
380  programs_description = description_list
381 
382  return programs_names, list_of_language_list, programs_description
383 
384  # - Others functions
385  def stop_program(self):
386  if not self.__program_is_running.program_is_running:
387  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "No program is running"
388 
389  try:
390  self.__loop_autorun = False
391  ret, message = self.__python3_manager.stop_execution()
392  if not self.__standalone:
393  self.__stop_robot_action()
394 
395  self.__program_is_running = ProgramIsRunning(False, ProgramIsRunning.PREEMPTED, "")
396  self.__program_is_running_publisher.publish(self.__program_is_running)
397 
398  except Exception as e:
399  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FAILURE, str(e)
400 
401  if ret:
402  self.__execution_stopped = True
403  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Stop program success"
404  else:
405  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_STOPPING_FAILED, message
406 
407  @staticmethod
408  def __stop_robot_action():
409  # Stop current move command
410  try:
411  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', 1)
412  stop_cmd = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', Trigger)
413  stop_cmd()
414  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
415  pass
416 
417 
418 if __name__ == "__main__":
419  sentry_init()
420 
421  rospy.init_node('niryo_programs_manager', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
422 
423  # change logger level according to node parameter
424  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
425  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
426  logger.setLevel(log_level)
427 
428  try:
429  node = ProgramManagerNode()
430  rospy.spin()
431  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
432  pass
